overview:
With a double background in advertising & web technologies, Emmanuel Vivier has been conceiving 360° advertising, digital and word of mouth marketing strategies for leading brands for more than 12 years now.

Speaking French, English, German, Spanish,he is the CoFounder of the HUB INSTITUTE (http://www.hubinstitute.com), a digital think thank, training and advising leading brands and agencies in order to master digital marketing innovation. The HUB INSTITUTE organizes 2 leading conferences (HUBFORUM : http://www.hubforum.com in Paris & Moscow), networking events (HUB KLUB), many bespoke seminars and publishes reports & industry benchmarks.

Emmanuel previously cofounded and managed Vanksen advertising agency for 10 years (http://www.vanksen). With offices in Paris, Luxembourg & Geneva Vanksen is one of the leading digital, buzz, social media & advertising agency with more than 110 experts. Vanksen is proud to assist numerous leading brands & organizations such as the Luxembourg government, l’Oréal, Louis Vuitton, Givenchy, Guerlain, Thierry Mugler, LVMH, Richemont Group, Audemars Piguet, ArcelorMittal, Bic, Sony, Nokia, Warner Bros, 20th Century Fox, Microsoft, Ubisoft, Norton, Pfizer, Orange, Citroën, Ford, Louvre Hotels,…

As one of the world top “Word of Mouth Marketing” & social media marketing expert, Emmanuel has spoken at more than 450 events and conferences worldwide and trained more than 4500 executives during the past 6 years.
